A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'll join the chorus of voices asking where the 92% positive critic score comes from.  This movie is aimed toward the children's and teen market - I'm happy to say it was met with a resounding 'meh' by my 12 year old.  Disjointed and derivative\, often pointless plot lines\, and characters inserted with the clear objective of introducing a new line of figurines.  Clumsy and transparent attempts at pushing a social agenda added a further distraction. I suffered through the full length of this overly long movie only because I'd accompanied a minor.  Turns out he wanted to leave early too.
